item.title: Vinyl Setup
item.description: Afternoon, Today, I thought it would be a great idea to share my audio equipment. I happen to love audio equipment quite a bit, and would say that music is a big part of my life. Now, Vinyl is one of the most unconventional way to listen to music, but the whole experience is a great treat, forcing you to listen to the music. I love the whole process and everything about it, and would love to share it.

item.title: React Pixi.js Development Part 1
item.description: Afternoon, For the past few months, I have been wanting to get into game development for quite some time. It was one of my passions as a kid, but I never thought I could do it until now. As stated earlier, I am a web developer, with a little over 1 year of developer experience. Every time I have tried, I got a little frustrated due to very high inconsistencies with an entire game engine framework vs.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Denny, or known as “Doggobot” on the internet, and I am a full stack web developer prioritizing in React and React Native. I have been a proffesional developer for over a year now, and have been actively coding for over 2 years. My preffered stack is React with a docker contained Postgres backend and an Express + knex api. But I am also flexible with many different backend practices, including firebase, sails, and AWS.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to contact me with either of these options! ninicdennis@gmail.com Linkedin

item.title: Personal Developer Equipment
item.description: Afternoon, I thought as an Initial post I would create a post talking about my development gear. From time to time, I always get people asking me why I choose to use my certain laptop, keyboard, etc. and I thought this would be a great time to give a rundown on why I use it, and why I have not upgraded in a long time. As a tl;dr, here is a simple rundown:

item.title: Personal NAS / Plex / E-book server - Part 1
item.description: Afternoon, Today, I wanted to talk about a future plan I have going on right now. Recently, I had found a Dell R640 for VERY cheap, but my main issue is where the server rack is located, I can not have it running at certain times, as it is very very loud. I am currently in the process of moving this specific server to a place where noise wouldn’t be an issue.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Skills 2+ Years developing with Javascript, React, HTML5, CSS3, PostgreSQL and Node. 1+ Years developing with React Native, Express, Django, Firebase, AWS, Wordpress. Proficiency in developing under Linux, Windows, and Mac, preferring linux and terminal commands. Published 1 web application and 1 phone application to the web/android/IOS stores respectively. Excels with Git, Docker, Postman, Next.JS, Python, and building documentation. Skills in building custom javascript scrapers and bots. Work Experience React Lead Developer Bright Bridge Web | December 2020 - Present
